title: An Atlas of Impossible Longing leaves

content.prompt: In the final paragraph, when Nirmal strokes one of the Himalayan leaves in his exercise book “with infinite gentleness” and “smiled to himself,” he demonstrates

choices.label: his satisfaction with his professional accomplishments
an inability to interact meaningfully in civilized society
a deeper interest in his hobbies than in his daughter
his persistent desire for fortune and notoriety

skill.text: Skill 3.E: Explain the function of a significant event or related set of significant events in a plot.
